narrative:
No Non-compliant items identified this inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Prelicense Inspection for a Class A licence. 
 
The licensing fee must be mailed to: 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B, 3W11 
Fort Collins, CO  80526 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility represetative.
